text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium maximae is a species in the genus Penicillium which is named after Queen Máxima of the Netherlands.
text.Further reading:
Visagie, C. M.; Houbraken, J.; Rodriques, C.; Pereira, C. S.; Dijksterhuis, J.; Seifert, K. A.; Jacobs, K.; Samson, R. A. (2013). "Five new Penicillium species in section Sclerotiora: A tribute to the Dutch Royal family". Persoonia. 31: 42–62. doi:10.3767/003158513X667410. PMC 3904052. PMID 24761034.
